title: glove80
notes:
german keyboard layout special characters:
^ -> &kp GRAVE
° -> &kp LS(GRAVE)
| -> &kp RA(NUBS)
\ -> &kp RA(MINUS)
? -> &kp LS(MINUS)
' -> &kp LS(NON_US_HASH)
´ -> &kp EQUAL
` -> &kp LS(EQUAL)
# -> &kp NON_US_HASH
+ -> &kp RBKT
* -> &kp LS(RBKT)
~ -> &kp RA(RBKT)
< -> &kp NUBS
> -> &kp LS(NUBS)
